mapper.select: select role_id roleId, role_name roleName, create_time createTime, remark from sys_role order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role( role_name, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{roleName}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user u on rm.role_id = u.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = u.role_id where m.status = '0' and u.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct r.role_id, r.role_name, r.create_time, r.remark from sys_role r left join sys_user u on u.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct m.menu_id menuId, m.parent_id parentId, m.menu_name menuName, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame isFrame, m.is_cache isCache, m.menu_type menuType, m.icon, m.order_num orderNum, m.create_time createTime from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id menuId, m.parent_id parentId, m.menu_name menuName, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame isFrame, m.is_cache isCache, m.menu_type menuType, m.icon, m.order_num orderNum, m.create_time createTime from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user u on rm.role_id = u.role_id left join sys_role ro on u.role_id = ro.role_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
